title: Firefox 120 to Finally Let Ubuntu Users Import Chromium Browser Data in Firefox Snap
description:
Firefox 120 web browser is now available for public beta testing with new privacy features, improved Picture-in-Picture, support for Firefox Snap when importing Chromium Snap browser data, and more.

The post Firefox 120 to Finally Let Ubuntu Users Import Chromium Browser Data in Firefox Snap appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.

title: KDE Plasma 5.27.9 Improves Plasma Wayland and Flatpak-Based GNOME Apps
description:
KDE Plasma 5.27.9 desktop environment is now available with fixes and improvements for Plasma Wayland, Plasma X11, Plasma Discover, KWin, Flatpak apps, and more.

The post KDE Plasma 5.27.9 Improves Plasma Wayland and Flatpak-Based GNOME Apps appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
